/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban architecture. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
